DOC.brief_summary: Glycemic index concept widely use determine impact food blood glucose . Although previous study show glycemic index seem relate subject-specific factor , currently several study find conflict result relationship subject ' characteristic glycemic index value . This study aim determine whether body composition parameter , subject-specific factor , correlate glycemic index value .
DOC.brief_title: Relationship Glycemic Index Values Subjects ' Body Composition Parameters
DOC.detailed_description: Glycemic index method perform accord Food Agricultural Organization/WHO recommendation .
DOC.criteria: age 2040 year fast blood glucose 70100 mg/dL Indonesians diabetes smoke woman , pregnant lactate allergic food use study gastrointestinal disturbance regular medication refusal sign consent form
